title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 149 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 149 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Praise ye the LORD. Sing unto the LORD a new song, and his praise in the congregation of saints.
lineList.cn: 你们要赞美耶和华，向耶和华唱新歌，在圣民的会中赞美他。

lineList.en: Let Israel rejoice in him that made him: let the children of Zion be joyful in their King.
lineList.cn: 愿以色列因造他的主欢喜。愿锡安的民，因他们的王快乐。

lineList.en: Let them praise his name in the dance: let them sing praises unto him with the timbrel and harp.
lineList.cn: 愿他们跳舞赞美他的名，击鼓弹琴歌颂他。

lineList.en: For the LORD taketh pleasure in his people: he will beautify the meek with salvation.
lineList.cn: 因为耶和华喜爱他的百姓。他要用救恩当作谦卑人的妆饰。

lineList.en: Let the saints be joyful in glory: let them sing aloud upon their beds.
lineList.cn: 愿圣民因所得的荣耀高兴。愿他们在床上欢呼。

lineList.en: Let the high praises of God be in their mouth, and a two-edged sword in their hand;
lineList.cn: 愿他们口中称赞神为高，手里有两刃的刀。

lineList.en: To execute vengeance upon the heathen, and punishments upon the people;
lineList.cn: 为要报复列邦，刑罚万民。

lineList.en: To bind their kings with chains, and their nobles with fetters of iron;
lineList.cn: 要用链子捆他们的君王，用铁镣锁他们的大臣。

lineList.en: To execute upon them the judgment written: this honour have all his saints. Praise ye the LORD.
lineList.cn: 要在他们身上施行所记录的审判。他的圣民都有这荣耀。你们要赞美耶和华。
